content: Non-GAAP EBITDA during the third quarter that excluded stock-based compensation, depreciation and amortization, expenses related to geographic reorganization, transaction and other related costs was $17.1 million or 21.1% of revenue, up from $13.3 million or 17.2% in the second quarter of 2022 and up from $12.5 million or 21.6% in the year ago quarter. On a non-GAAP basis, in the third quarter of our non-GAAP net income was $11 million or $0.15 per share based on 72 million diluted shares compared to the second quarter of 2022 non-GAAP net income of $8.2 million or $0.12 per diluted share based on 70 million diluted shares and $7.9 million or $0.11 per diluted share based on 69 million diluted shares in the year ago quarter.
